mapper.insert: insert into member(password, name, phone, gender, profile, birthDate, email,nickname,address) values(#{password},#{name},#{phone},#{gender},#{profile},#{birthDate},#{email},#{nickname},#{address});
mapper.select: select * from member where email=#{email} and name = #{name} and birthDate=#{birthDate}
select * from member where email=#{email} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, savedfilename=#{savedFileName},phone=#{phone},profile=#{profile} where memberno=#{memberNo}
update member set password=#{password} where memberno=#{memberNo}
